lyrics.stanza: Throughout the past twenty centuries Tens of thousands of precious lives, Heart treasures, high positions, And golden futures have been "wasted" Upon the Lord Jesus. To the ones who love Him in such a way He is altogether lovely and worthy of their offering. What they have poured upon the Lord is not a waste But a fragrant testimony of His sweetness. What they have poured upon the Lord is not a waste But a fragrant testimony of His sweetness.
